/usr/bin/c++     CMakeFiles/DistributedPerceptron.dir/src/main.cc.o CMakeFiles/DistributedPerceptron.dir/src/process.cc.o CMakeFiles/DistributedPerceptron.dir/src/matrix/matrix.cc.o CMakeFiles/DistributedPerceptron.dir/src/nn/nn.cc.o  -o DistributedPerceptron -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib /usr/local/lib/libmpi.so
